Tiempo de ejecución: 0.0128693 segundos

Polinomio (x+1)^100:
(x+1)^100 = x^100 + 100x^99 + 4950x^98 + 161700x^97 + 3921225x^96 + 75287520x^95 + 1192052400x^94 + -1172308384x^93 + 1404300572x^92 + -438703728x^91 + 1591253560x^90 + -1036909296x^89 + 899523980x^88 + 802971808x^87 + 1308495696x^86 + 1489087776x^85 + -2021333062x^84 + -639893368x^83 + -1757572948x^82 + -1707991160x^81 + -474913254x^80 + -1195626592x^79 + 587258256x^78 + -1182969568x^77 + 1394391452x^76 + -2117601584x^75 + 664366936x^74 + -1360599728x^73 + 1054472812x^72 + 396466656x^71 + -2068172688x^70 + -375100064x^69 + 399150039x^68 + -739315300x^67 + 58984778x^66 + -870478372x^65 + -2048915649x^64 + -1222466368x^63 + 459839456x^62 + 1612045760x^61 + -762855688x^60 + 1502508320x^59 + -1672995216x^58 + -558587872x^57 + -1992592808x^56 + -1238902720x^55 + 105973792x^54 + -974830272x^53 + 2144850380x^52 + -1931147152x^51 + -938977944x^50 + -1931147152x^49 + 2144850380x^48 + -974830272x^47 + 105973792x^46 + -1238902720x^45 + -1992592808x^44 + -558587872x^43 + -1672995216x^42 + 1502508320x^41 + -762855688x^40 + 1612045760x^39 + 459839456x^38 + -1222466368x^37 + -2048915649x^36 + -870478372x^35 + 58984778x^34 + -739315300x^33 + 399150039x^32 + -375100064x^31 + -2068172688x^30 + 396466656x^29 + 1054472812x^28 + -1360599728x^27 + 664366936x^26 + -2117601584x^25 + 1394391452x^24 + -1182969568x^23 + 587258256x^22 + -1195626592x^21 + -474913254x^20 + -1707991160x^19 + -1757572948x^18 + -639893368x^17 + -2021333062x^16 + 1489087776x^15 + 1308495696x^14 + 802971808x^13 + 899523980x^12 + -1036909296x^11 + 1591253560x^10 + -438703728x^9 + 1404300572x^8 + -1172308384x^7 + 1192052400x^6 + 75287520x^5 + 3921225x^4 + 161700x^3 + 4950x^2 + 100x + 1

Resultado para x = 2:
Cálculo para x = 2:
x^100 + 100x^99 + 4950x^98 + 161700x^97 + 3921225x^96 + 75287520x^95 + 1192052400x^94 + -1172308384x^93 + 1404300572x^92 + -438703728x^91 + 1591253560x^90 + -1036909296x^89 + 899523980x^88 + 802971808x^87 + 1308495696x^86 + 1489087776x^85 + -2021333062x^84 + -639893368x^83 + -1757572948x^82 + -1707991160x^81 + -474913254x^80 + -1195626592x^79 + 587258256x^78 + -1182969568x^77 + 1394391452x^76 + -2117601584x^75 + 664366936x^74 + -1360599728x^73 + 1054472812x^72 + 396466656x^71 + -2068172688x^70 + -375100064x^69 + 399150039x^68 + -739315300x^67 + 58984778x^66 + -870478372x^65 + -2048915649x^64 + -1222466368x^63 + 459839456x^62 + 1612045760x^61 + -762855688x^60 + 1502508320x^59 + -1672995216x^58 + -558587872x^57 + -1992592808x^56 + -1238902720x^55 + 105973792x^54 + -974830272x^53 + 2144850380x^52 + -1931147152x^51 + -938977944x^50 + -1931147152x^49 + 2144850380x^48 + -974830272x^47 + 105973792x^46 + -1238902720x^45 + -1992592808x^44 + -558587872x^43 + -1672995216x^42 + 1502508320x^41 + -762855688x^40 + 1612045760x^39 + 459839456x^38 + -1222466368x^37 + -2048915649x^36 + -870478372x^35 + 58984778x^34 + -739315300x^33 + 399150039x^32 + -375100064x^31 + -2068172688x^30 + 396466656x^29 + 1054472812x^28 + -1360599728x^27 + 664366936x^26 + -2117601584x^25 + 1394391452x^24 + -1182969568x^23 + 587258256x^22 + -1195626592x^21 + -474913254x^20 + -1707991160x^19 + -1757572948x^18 + -639893368x^17 + -2021333062x^16 + 1489087776x^15 + 1308495696x^14 + 802971808x^13 + 899523980x^12 + -1036909296x^11 + 1591253560x^10 + -438703728x^9 + 1404300572x^8 + -1172308384x^7 + 1192052400x^6 + 75287520x^5 + 3921225x^4 + 161700x^3 + 4950x^2 + 100x + 1 = 8194513195805184977
